arts.ttl: La Liga Round Up: Atletico Madrid struggles continue in Elche draw
arts.sum: Saturday’s La Liga action featured more frustration at the start of the new campaign for Atletico Madrid as they drew with Elche. Diego Simeone’s side are without a win in their opening two games of the 2025/26 campaign as they were unable to snatch a late winner ahead of Barcelona’s trip to Levante. arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Elche – Predicted Lineup and Team News
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid continue their La Liga campaign with a home fixture against newly-promoted Elche at the Riyadh Air Metropolitano on Saturday. After a disappointing 2-1 defeat to Espanyol on the opening day, Diego Simeone’s side will look to bounce back against a side eager to prove they belong in the top flight.
